STEPS.STEP1_TITLE: What is your level of physical activity?
STEPS.STEP1_DESCRIPTION: Select the option that best describes your daily activity.
STEPS.STEP2_TITLE: Do you exercise during the week?
STEPS.STEP2_DESCRIPTION: From working out at the gym or taking classes to running or playing a sport.
STEPS.STEP3_TITLE: How much do you usually hydrate during the day?
STEPS.STEP3_DESCRIPTION: Include water, coffee, soft drinks, and juices, but not alcoholic beverages.
STEPS.STEP4_TITLE: How many servings of fruits and vegetables do you eat per day?
STEPS.STEP4_DESCRIPTION: Include all the fruits and vegetables you usually consume.
STEPS.STEP5_TITLE: What are your main eating habits?
STEPS.STEP5_DESCRIPTION: Select the habits that best describe your diet.
STEPS.STEP6_TITLE: And finally, do you usually eat fruits and vegetables in your daily life?

RESET_PASSWORD.SUBTITLE: Enter and confirm your new password to restore access to your account.
RESET_PASSWORD.PASSWORD_REQUIREMENTS: Must have 8 characters and at least one uppercase, one lowercase and one number.

ERRORS.EMAIL_TAKEN: The entered email is already registered.
ERRORS.MINLENGTH: This field must be at least {{requiredLength}} characters
ERRORS.MINLENGTH_PASSWORD: The password must be at least {{requiredLength}} characters
ERRORS.MAXLENGTH: This field must not exceed {{requiredLength}} characters
ERRORS.NO_UPPERCASE: The password must contain at least one uppercase letter
ERRORS.NO_LOWERCASE: The password must contain at least one lowercase letter
ERRORS.NO_DIGIT: The password must contain at least one number
ERRORS.PATTERN: The entered format is not valid
ERRORS.MIN: The value is less than the minimum allowed
ERRORS.MAX: The value is greater than the maximum allowed
ERRORS.CM: Please enter your height in centimeters.
ERRORS.KG: Please enter the weight in kg
ERRORS.STRICT_EMAIL: Introduce un email con dominio válido (p. ej. usuario@dominio.com)
ERRORS.PASSWORD_UPPERCASE: La contraseña debe contener al menos una letra mayúscula
ERRORS.PASSWORD_LOWERCASE: La contraseña debe contener al menos una letra minúscula
ERRORS.PASSWORD_DIGIT: La contraseña debe contener al menos un número

PRO_FORM.STEP1_TITLE: This is your new lifestyle. This is.
PRO_FORM.STEP2_DESC: To create your user and personalize your experience in onepercent, we need to know more about you.
PRO_FORM.STEP4_DESC: Your height will be used to set your goals.
PRO_FORM.STEP6_TITLE: Which option best describes your gender identity currently?
PRO_FORM.STEP6_DESC: Your choice will not affect your goals.
PRO_FORM.STEP7_DESC: Choose the option that best matches your current physiology so we can properly adapt your goals.
PRO_FORM.STEP8_DESC: Ideally, use your weight from first thing in the morning as a reference.
PRO_FORM.STEP9_TITLE: How did you hear about onepercent?
PRO_FORM.STEP9_DESC: Select as many as you need.

By recommendation of a healthcare professional

BASIC_FORM.INTRO: To create your account and personalize your experience in onepercent, we need to know more about you.
BASIC_FORM.STEP5_DESC: Choose the option you feel most comfortable with.

PRO_FORM_PT2.STEP2_DESC: To be able to set your healthy goals, we need to know how much energy your body consumes.
